listBibl.bibl: Dr Jane Secker is Senior Lecturer in Educational Development at City, University of London.
Chris Morrison is Copyright and Licensing Specialist at the Bodleian Libraries, University of Oxford.
Frances Ridout is the Director of the Queen Mary Legal Advice Centre, Queen Mary University of London. She is a Barrister and Senior Lecturer.
